algorithm_technique: Simulation of state transitions based on adjacent element comparisons.
problem_summary_simple: Count points in an array that are higher or lower than their closest different neighbors.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the array, tracking the trend (increasing/decreasing) to identify hills and valleys based on adjacent non-equal elements.
key_insights: The core idea is to detect changes in the trend of the array.
Consecutive equal elements should be treated as a single block for trend detection.
A state variable can track the current trend (increasing or decreasing).
